title: Anyone else getting feeders or trolls in their ranked games?
body: I got silver on flex so I wanted to get silver on solo duo before I start trying to climb but I might have to call that rip cause these feeding blitzcranks or whatever appear like 1 every 2 games. New year ranked is messed up. They will int over champ select phase or an invade. Some games I can carry, some games my team can carry, or some games he is 0-16 and beyond the point of saving.

replies.body:
i had a guy who from what i can gather plays serious for most of the game, in our game 1 nexus turret away from victory, then totally trolls his team by never grouping and trying to do fancy get aways by using  zhonyas( on wukong lul). the game dragged on to the point were the rest of us agreed to ff. had 1 nexus tower left by 30 minutes....... we then surrendered at 54 minutes as it was just a waste of time contesting while this douche trolled us.

this graph pretty much sums it up. free lp just thrown out by some troll who gets their kicks from this shit lol. we are the red team, notice the chart nearly going out of the borders at 30 minutes ... fucking waste of time.

http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z459/Tom_Smoodger/b5%20in%20a%20nutshell_zpsct6riesz.jpg
